channel.title: Windows 7 - People cannot connect to my server - Wireless
channel.description: Hey everyone. I need someone to solve this for me as quick as he can. I`m on Windows 7, and from when i fixed my Wireless, people cannot connect to my server, like that they cannot connect to my IP. Could someone help me with this? :S, Thanks!

item.title: Windows 7 - People cannot connect to my server - Wireless
item.dc:creator: @Embold Embold
item.description:
@Embold wrote:

Well first off you need to change the ip of your server and client so that your client connects to the right place and so your server is being hosted on your ip and not local host.

After doing that you need to port forward so that other people can connect to your server, hope i helped.

Read full topic
item.source: Windows 7 - People cannot connect to my server - Wireless
